description:
■GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and story goes on.

■STORY
An unexpected car crash brought me, 
who was only half conscious, to a hospital

On regaining my consciousness,
I woke up to find something is off

The inside of the hospital looks so dilapidated 
that some part collapsed and dusty

That is giving me a bad feeling…
I must need to get out of this place now…
name: Escape Game The Abandoned Hospital
intro:
Something is wrong with the hospital they brought me to.
I have a bad feeling about this... 
I have to get out of here as soon as possible...
